entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-14
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-33170: .NET Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability #264

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [JIT] Assertion failed 'lastAllocatedRefPosition->registerAssignment != RBM_NONE' in 'System.SpanHelpers:NonPackedIndexOfValueType[short,System.SpanHelpers+DontNegate`1[short]](byref,short,int):int' during 'LSRA build intervals' #88937
  • [wasm] Improve some CI job triggers #88936
    8.0.0
  • AesGcm documentation needs some adjustments #88933
  • `RequestReJITWithInliners` can cause an access violation and crash the application #88924
    8.0.0
  • timeout in FailedRequests_ConnectionClosedWhileReceivingHeaders_Recorded #88921
  • `.\build.cmd -subset clr+libs -config release` fails in `ConfigurationBindingGenerator` #88918
    8.0.0
  • Document NativeAOT diagnostics for the .NET8 release #88905
    8.0.0
  • Ensure createdump works with NativeAOT applications #88904
  • Enhance CA1305 analyzer to cover interpolated strings #88902
  • Consider running debug builds of analyzers/source generators in some build leg #88901
  • [browser][nodejs] RequestDuration_CustomTags_Recorded - ENOENT: no such file or directory, open 'http://127.0.0.1:45051/' #88900
    8.0.0
  • NET8: BinaryFormatter not supported when .resx contains "application/x-microsoft.net.object.binary.base64" #88899
  • Severity Code Description Project File Line Suppression State Error NU1102 Unable to find package Microsoft.NETCore.App.Runtime.Mono.browser-wasm with version (= 7.0.9) - Found 47 version(s) in nuget.org [ Nearest version: 8.0.0-preview.1.23110.8 ] - Found 0 version(s) in Microsoft Visual Studio Offline Packages - Found 0 version(s) in #88898

Closed

  • should expose the accumulative GC pause duration as a counter #69324
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: HttpClient/HttpMessageInvoker metrics #84978
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/opt/Add/IntAdd/IntAdd.cmd #88879
    8.0.0
  • Timeout in Microsoft.Gen.OptionsValidation.Unit.Test.EmitterTest #88784
    8.0.0
  • File check failures in x64 jit tests #88783
    8.0.0
  • Access violation occurring during JIT compilation of Vector2 constructor #84546
    8.0.0
  • Fatal error when trying to run Blazor #88608
  • Move BackgroundService implementation from StartAsync to the new StartedAsync #88605
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.Cose.Tests.CoseSign1MessageTests_SignStream_Sync.SignVerifyWithCustomCoseHeaderMaps #88896
  • Test failure Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.Specification.LamarDependencyInjectionSpecificationTests.SafelyDisposeNestedProviderReferences #88895
  • test failure in DynamicDependencyMethod #88922
  • Test failure Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.Tests.NamedArgumentTests.TestNamedParamsVariousFormsDynamicallyDeducedTypes #88891
  • Test failure System.Net.Mail.Tests.SmtpClientTest.TestGssapiAuthentication #88889
  • Test failure System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.MonoTests.ValidateRegex #88888
  • Test failure System.Runtime.InteropServices.Tests.SafeBufferTests.ReadWrite_RoundTrip #88887
  • Test failure Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.Tests.ImplicitConversionTests.NumericNullableConversions #88885
  • Test failure JIT/Performance/CodeQuality/BenchmarksGame/regex-redux/regex-redux-1/regex-redux-1.dll #88882
  • Test failure readytorun\\coreroot_determinism\\coreroot_determinism\\coreroot_determinism.cmd #88881
  • Test failure Interop\\StructMarshalling\\ReversePInvoke\\MarshalExpStruct\\DelegatePInvoke\\DelegatePInvokeTest\\DelegatePInvokeTest.cmd #88880
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Metrics.Tests.AggregationStoreTests.GetThreeLabel #88890
  • R2R Test CpuId_R2R_Avx fails locally #88156
  • Mono.Linker.Tests.TestCases.All.DynamicDependencies test failure #88870
  • Improve feature parity between JsonSerializerOptions and JsonSourceGenerationOptionsAttribute #57321
    8.0.0
  • Blazor shouldn't enable debugging when not debugging #87178
  • [API Proposal] HttpClientFactory logging configuration #77312
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Handle variable page size on Linux Arm64 #75737
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal] ConfigureHttpClientDefaults for HttpClientFactory #87914
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: RuntimeHelpers.ChangeType<TDelegate>(Delegate) API #57495
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Convert between degrees and radians #86402
  • [wasm] V8 crash with`System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.Tests` on linux #74723
    8.0.0
  • `double.IsPow2` reports incorrectly for subnormal numbers #88023
  • Windbg Can't Unwind Stacks for Single-File Dumps Captured with procdump #83985
    Future
  • ComInterfaceGenerator.Unit.Tests.CompileFails.VerifyByValueMarshallingAttributeUsage tests are failing #88867
    8.0.0
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Trailing trivia after GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute included in generated files #88798
    8.0.0
  • Incomplete managed stacktrace in windbg #78538
    Future
  • Static virtual reabstraction doesn't seem to work #71414
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2222524 #88935
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Run NativeAOT tests when ILLink changes #88934
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix behavior of default interfaces interacting with constraints #88932
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Exclude unnecessary artifacts from the Native AOT sample app bundle #88931
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Expose the left-handed matrix creation APIs #88930
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use live illink for trimming tests #88929
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix use-out-of-scope in signature comparison #88928
    blocking, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Fix GCDesc computation #88927
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [WASM] Add ILStrip task to wasm app build process #88926
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Some UnsafeAccessorAttribute support for methods and constructors #88925
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Light up core ASCII.CaseConversion methods with Vector256/Vector512 code paths #88923
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Fix genPutArgStkFieldList for SIMD12 #88920
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Using "rollForwardOnNoCandidateFx": 2 for BrowserDebugHost #88919
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • Improve default cross compiler state #88917
    area-Build-mono
  • Relax property naming conflict resolution for interface hierarchies. #88916
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [mono][llvm] Prevent method to LLVM function mapping where possible #88914
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Enabled more intrinsics for V4 on arm64 #88912
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add package readme for System.Net.Http #88911
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [browser] Allow download retry+throttling in unified code with blazor #88910
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [mono][ios] Drop marshal-ilgen from iOS builds if it is not needed #88903
    area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Enable IOPack, IOEnqueue, and IODequeue on Windows #88894
    area-System.Threading
  • [mono][interp] Fix memory leaks for interpreted dynamic methods. #88892
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [Android] Use NDK toolchain instead of CMake for library mode #88886
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Support NO_PROXY": "localhost" in launchSettings.json #88884
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • Remove incorrect flag setting #88878
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Merged

  • JIT: Enabled embedded broadcast for binary ops #87946
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Total time in GC counter #88699
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Add SocketsHttpHandler connection metrics #88893
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Make firing of ETW events in nativeaot opt-in via the enabled/disabled lib #88800
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Re-enable JSON tests #88883
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • UTFn->UTF-n #88913
    area-Meta
  • Ensure that IsSupported being false disables the tracked hierachy in our tests #88848
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Use latest chrome for testing #88505
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix missing using statement #88906
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Remove handwritten binding logic from Logging.Console; use generator instead #88067
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • Extend JsonSourceGenerationOptionsAttribute to have feature parity with JsonSerializerOptions. #88753
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [7.0] Backport "Fix MSBuild integration for the host build with CMake 3.26" #88809
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix TimeZoneInfoTests.cs on iOS/tvOS #88909
    area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Support variable page size on Linux Arm64 #88710
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • HttpClientFactory logging configuration #88706
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • EventPipe support for ProcessInfo #87562
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [browser] bump npm packages + fix webpack sample #88907
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add smoke unit runtime tests for Native AOT on iOS platforms #87260
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [browser] detect and assert engine features #88846
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Enable StressLogAnalyzer to read stress logs from old coreclr running with a new clrgc. #88852
    area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Improve debugger performance based on JMC #86982
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2221896 #88636
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Presize dictionary in regex interpreter #88558
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add AddHttpClientDefaults #87953
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • Simplify condition to detect recursive inlining #88849
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Enable dynamic linking for maccatalyst in sandbox environment #88847
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, os-maccatalyst, 8.0.0
  • Skip internal tool restore on mac #88877
    needs-area-label
  • Expose the DegreesToRadians and RadiansToDegrees APIs #88866
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Ensure that INumberBase implements IUtf8SpanFormattable #88840
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Simplify ldftn reverse lookups #88719
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix alloc-dealloc mismatch #88875
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable new analyzers CA1862, CA1864 in runtime and fix findings. #88700
    area-Meta
  • Feature to be able to selectively deoptimize methods #88797
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Stop importing function table when compiling wasm modules in jiterp #88876
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Strip trivia from tokens. #88856
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] UnsafeAccessorAttribute non-generic support for field #88626
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix reading metadata info after applying changes #88685
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Implement reabstraction in CoreCLR for Static Virtual Methods #88711
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Clean up the optimizing.md document #88816
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ensure that IsPow2 for floating-point numbers correctly take subnormal values into account #88839
    area-System.Numerics

Updated

  • [ILASM] Added `/DET` flag for deterministic compilations #85344
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Flush the gclog after GC #88222
    area-GC-coreclr
  • SBLK_MASK_LOCK_THREADID allow tid up to 65535 #88772
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Improve `File.Copy` by using the block copy operation for ReFS on Windows #88695
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add System.Net.NameResolution metrics #88773
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] Skip RC2 encrypted PKCS12 files on Android for iteration counting #88854
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, test-bug
  • Don't fallback to PNSE, and give a more descriptive error message. #88804
    area-Serialization, 8.0.0
  • Configure SocketsHttpHandler for HttpClientFactory with IConfiguration #88864
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • Add public MethodInvoker and ConstructorInvoker classes #88415
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Register a callback that tries to load other versions Open LDAP library if the default is failed #88851
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • Fix `TimeZoneInfo.Equals` and `TimeZoneInfo.HasSameRules` #88869
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • [browser] mono_exit improvements #88387
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Implement support for `UnsafeAccessor` in the trimmer #88268
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • fix pooled array leak #88810
    area-System.IO
  • Add opt-in support for GeneratedComInterface/ComImport RCW interop #87583
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [NativeAOT] Remove ThunkPool crst. #88778
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Light up Ascii.IsValidCore with Vector512 code path #88872
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Add BinaryData.ContentType #87744
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Intrinsify Unsafe.Read/Write/Copy, handle struct BitCast #85562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][tests] Parallel AOT compilation of runtime tests on iOS platforms #86089
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • [Mono]: Add dotnet-gcdump support. #88634
    area-Tracing-mono
  • [ios][tests] Run the Mono and Native AOT iOS samples as functional tests on Helix #87773
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Light up core ASCII.Utility methods with Vector256/Vector512 code paths. #88532
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [browser][mt] Release all proxies of C# and JS objects on WebWorker #88052
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Flow TasksConfiguration in build & specify generator config #84931
    area-Infrastructure
  • Don't crash the trim analyzer if it finds unrecognized nodes in the input #88836
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [libs][iOS] Unify `System.Linq.Expression.dll` build for all platforms #88723
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • Remove createdump's DAC dependency for the PAL for NativeAOT #88802
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Accelerating Vector512.Sum() #87851
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Extend SocketsHttpHandler Connection and Request telemetry #88853
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Light up Ascii.Equality.Equals and Ascii.Equality.EqualsIgnoreCase with Vector512 code path #88650
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Prevent Arm64 CrossDac builds running on Arm64. #88467
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • Move GetMethodTable and IsReference to JIT #88860
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [API Proposal]: Create array from array type #88620
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [RISC-V] Fix GitHub_* tests #88640
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add docs on using Bionic with NativeAOT #88817
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Added QuicException.TransportErrorCode #88550
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • Enable ExtendedProtectionPolicy in generic System.Net.Security build #88871
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] macOS/iOS: Emit simple compact unwinding information #88724
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Trim XmlSerializers codegen if unsupported #88796
    area-Serialization, linkable-framework, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE] [mono] Add support for SSE1 in JIT mode. #88075
    NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Write perfmap and jitdump files to /tmp by default [6.0 port] #88486
    Servicing-consider, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Mark final types as exact #88163
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix NaN canonicalization issue #88510
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix DevDiv_718151 test #88404
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-14
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable tests and fix bugs #2307

PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] GCDesc computation fix #2340
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] A few ILC cleanups #2339
  • ManagedZLib Experiment #2325

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Use trimmed-down RID graph for .NET 8 and higher #34033
  • Enable SxS workload manifest support for file-based installs #34032
  • New repo with list of workloads in a .props file #34031
  • Allow CTRL + R to work even when "waiting for a file change before restarting dotnet" #34029
  • `PublishAot` should have better error messages when cross-compiling #34027
  • `-a` sets app to framework-dependent when `SelfContained` is `true` #34026
  • msbuild.exe is only available in visual studio right? #34020
  • Unable to add two projects with the same name to a .sln file if the projects share the same grandparent folder #34019

Closed

  • When installing a .NET local tool, create the tool manifest if one does not exist #15254
    8.0.1xx
  • scriptcs : The term 'scriptcs' is not recognized as the name of a cmdlet, function, script file, or operable program. verify that the path is correct and try again. At line:1 char:1 + scriptcs "c:\Users\THY-USER\Documents\Untitled-1.cs" + ~~~~~~~~ + CategoryInfo : ObjectNotFound: (scriptcs:Strin g) [], CommandNotFoundException + FullyQualifiedErrorId : CommandNotFoundException PS C:\Users\THY-USER\Documents> scriptcs "c:\Users\THY-USER\Documents\Untitled-1.cs" scriptcs : The term 'scriptcs' is not recognized as the name + ~~~~~~~~ file, or operable program. + CategoryInfo : , or if a path was included, ObjectNotFound: (scriptcs:Strit and try again.n g) [], CommandNotFoundExcepDocuments\Untitled-1.cs"tion + FullyQualifiedErrorId : ObjectNotFound: (scriptcs:Strin CommandNotFoundException tion CommandNotFoundException PS C:\Users\THY-USER\Documents> #34008

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #34034
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Keep TrimMode=partial for projects targeting .NET 7 or below #34030
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #34025
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Set EnableRequestDelegateGenerator=true when PublishTrimmed=true #34022
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Don't fire NETSDK1206 if known RID platforms were not determined #34021
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Tool install local command: Download tool packages from nuget when installing local tools #34004
    untriaged, Area-Tools

Merged

  • Update default TrimMode for WebSDK projects #33962
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #33994
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • First-run: Minor code adjustments #33935
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2222520 #34037
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [wasm] Override versions of previous runtime packs #32882
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, 8.0.1xx
  • Add workload version subcommand Fixes #33912 #33996
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Containers: improved `DockerRegistryManager` for tests reliability #33955
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • For templating#3553. Make search results downloads column optional #33024
    untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-14
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Warn when a record includes a member that can't use value equality #7337

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Interceptors #7009
  • [Proposal]: Collection literals #5354
    Working Set

PullRequests

Merged

  • Emit `ref readonly` parameters in function pointers without `modreq(In)` #7307

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Error list errors (examples: XDG0012) opens the browser to bingdev.cloudapp.net - Certificate for that domain is expired... *again* #69044
  • Inference of function type should only consider one extension scope at a time #69042
    17.8
  • Compiler doesn't tokenize surrogate pairs correctly #69041
  • Update our LSIF moniker scopes to be more specific #69036

Closed

  • Runtime and build-time recursive cast for generic arguments #69035
  • Public API changes for InlineArrays feature #68719
  • Post-Build Analyzer Reporting: Log analyzer performance metrics in Sarif v2 #68476
  • IDE errors with file-local extension method #67940
    17.7

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "Port 68919 to 17.7" from main #69046
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Port 68919 to 17.7 #69045
    Area-Compilers, OnDeckForQB, 17.7 P5
  • Update roslyn-analyzers to 8.0.0-preview.23364.2 #69043
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reduce `TypeConversions`, bool arrays, and `HashSet<TypeWithAnnotations>` allocations #69040
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Widen `RefKindVector` to hold `RefReadonlyParameter` #69034
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • Make the new `RefKind.RefReadonlyParameter` sequential #69033
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • Allow default values for `ref readonly` parameters #69032
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • Update Compiler Breaking Changes documentation (VS2015 - VS2019) #69031
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • bumped telemetry 17.8.9 #68982
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Port 68919 to 17.7 #69038
    Area-Compilers, OnDeckForQB, Next
  • Misc improvements of OneOrMany #68948
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Only produce string-subspans for spell checking when they contain an escape character #69037
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Disallow declaring required element fields for an inline array. #68984
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays, Next
  • Warn on shadowing primary constructor parameter by a member from base #68864
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors, Next
  • Enhance the SARIF v2 log to report analyzer execution time #68607
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Emit modopt for ref readonly parameters in function pointers #68728
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, 17.8
  • Fix assertion failure in semantic model for file-local extension methods #68962
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Update signature matching rule in interceptors #69006
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Collection literals: collection builder methods #68930
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: Implement json serialization/deserialization for LSP json messages. #68990
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Require `SizeConst` for `UnmanagedType.ByValArray` #68992
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Backlog
  • Add 'priority' concept to our code actions, and code refactoring/fix providers. #68511
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not consider DOTNET_ROOT when finding dotnet #69010
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Avoid binding lambdas unnecessarily in some error scenarios #59733
    Area-Compilers
  • Consolidate Interlocked initialize implementations #69017
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Relax ref readonly parameter signature matching #68680
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • Cache RetargetingParameterSymbol.TypeWithAnnotations to avoid ~8.3% allocations in a trace #69011
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Reduce array allocations in `PENamedTypeSymbol.TypeParameters` and `PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers` #68978

  • Reduce allocations of Location instances #68936
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.8
  • Simplify core lexing switch #69005
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Design proposal for a new QuickGridC component #49426
  • Blazor Server with Microsoft Identity and Azure SignalR Using Multiple Hubs #49425
  • Expose AccessTokenResponse from the new BearerToken AuthenticatonHandler #49424
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef, mapaction #49419
  • JSDisconnectedException when trying to dispose JavaScript module in a component's DisposeAsync method #49418
  • Update user-jwts to support new Identity bearer tokens #49416
  • `Html.HiddenFor` will never use `value` property from `htmlAttributes` to assign value #49415
  • Ability to programmatically perform an "enhanced page refresh" #49414
    8.0-rc1
  • Restructure Blazor.Web template to split out client project #49412
    8.0-rc1
  • Make Blazor apps fully trimmable #49409
  • AddIdentityBearerToken should not be generic #49404
  • Consider adding an API to tell you the current rendering platform #49401
  • Default Blazor WebAssembly publish now outputs dotnet.native.wasm in wrong place #49399
  • Json Converter option ignored while binding enum from query #49398
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, plainTextEmptyFilter #49396
  • How does 'System.Web.Http' Compiles in .NET 7 Blazor server Application #49411

Closed

  • Remove the ASP.NET Core Angular & React templates from the .NET SDK for .NET 8 #49388
    8.0-preview7
  • MethodNotFound Microsoft.AspNetCore.Diagnostics.DeveloperExceptionPageMiddleware #49421
  • Quarantine Http2WebSocketTests.HEADERS_Received_SecondRequest_Accepted #42133
    Test failures
  • QuicConnectionListenerTests.AcceptAsync_NoCertificateCallback_RemovedFromPendingConnections failing with leaked QuicConnection #48678
  • Quarantine BlazorWasmHostedTemplate_AzureActiveDirectoryTemplate_* #47933
    8.0
  • Quarantine ResponseCachingMiddlewareTests.FinalizeCacheHeadersAsync_ResponseValidity_UseExpiryIfAvailable #48373
    Test failures
  • MVC apps no longer work with PublishTrimmed #49360
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #49397
  • Blazor substitute for the input tag helper #49132
    Backlog
  • [Blazor] Enhanced navigation does not display 4xx errors #49115
    8.0-preview7
  • [Blazor] Introduce `[QueryParameter]` and `[FormParameter]` #48443
    8.0-rc1
  • Consider removing RazorComponentResult #49227
    8.0-rc1
  • `dotnet run` won't work by default for the new Blazor Web template #49071
    8.0-preview7
  • [Trimming Bug?] Passing byte array to JS interop fails in release build (Blazor Webassembly) #49402
  • .net core 7 AddProblemDetails only show Response Header #49239
  • BindAsync support in RDG doesn't handle implementations inherited from interfaces. #47389
    8.0-preview6
  • Identity is not null-checked #49211
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Adding QuickGridC component to QuickGrid library #49427
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [SignalR] Harden MessageBuffer #49423
    area-signalr
  • [Blazor] API for interacting with runtime #49420
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview7
  • Emit diagnostics for unsupported RDG scenarios #49417
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `be03d00` to `cc36671` #49408
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `9a77922` to `b644ea1` #49407
    area-infrastructure
  • [wasm][debugger] Support NO_PROXY": "localhost" in launchSettings.json #49395
    area-blazor
  • API template updates #49394
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Remove Spa-templates from repo #49413
    area-infrastructure, area-mvc, 8.0-preview7
  • Unquarantine healthy tests. #49378
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview7
  • Set default JSON type resolver if not set #49393
    area-mvc, area-minimal, 8.0-preview7
  • [main] (deps): Bump actions/checkout from 2 to 3 #49405
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview7
  • [main] (deps): Bump actions/setup-node from 1 to 3 #49406
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview7
  • Add PackageArchives for 2.1.39 #49410
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.40
  • [Blazor] Finalize the integration between runtime and Blazor #49385
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview7

    area-identity, area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0-preview7

Updated

    area-blazor
  • Forms behavior clarifications #49340
    area-blazor
  • Improve pfx support for CertificateConfigLoader #43719

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Declare the windows.protocol usage of the protocol/scheme `https` in your AppxManifest.xml file" #16172
  • DispatcherTimer reports itself as running after firing when IsRepeating is false #16171
  • Allow MAUI shapes to be used as an ImageSource #16170
  • Designer extensibility for third-party controls #16169
  • .NET 8 Preview 6 Android target #16166
  • BlazorWebView&WebView Unable to load on the windows11 system, the program crashes directly #16161
  • Datepicker in collectionview header shifts content down when opened on iOS #16160
  • Android splashscreen SVG not shown #16159
  • CarouselView does not update on first mouse click else works fine #16157
  • invalid android:versionCode - Android app doesn't build in default .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid app #16155
  • Include Map xml namespace by default on .NET 8 too, on NET 7 it works without any explicit definition #16154

Closed

  • WinUI Shell does not consistently react to shell structure changes #7171
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Exception thrown: 'Microsoft.Maui.Platform.HandlerNotFoundException' in Microsoft.Maui.dll #8988
    Backlog
  • [Bug] .NET MAUI RC1 - Shell - OnDisappearing not executing and OnAppearing is only executed the first time #6226
    Backlog
  • Image only Aspect fill #16076
    Backlog
  • EFCore Migrations Not Supported By Maui Class Libraries #16140
  • Building for Android fails because iOS SDK is missing #16146
  • Multiple Collection Views don't display correctly with visual studio for Mac compiled for Mac Catalyst. #10943
    Backlog
  • MAUI Android | Carousel in the page is being stretched in landscape mode #14989
  • Slider MinimumTrackColor has no effect on Windows #16056
    Backlog
  • Android Crash ImageSource Glyph #12513
    Backlog
  • Scrollview pushes button below beyond the screen on iOS #16051
    Backlog
  • Unable to publish and generate ipa file in .net 8.0 preview 5 #15973

PullRequests

Created

  • Stop DispatcherTimer after Tick fires if IsRepeating is false #16173
  • Bump powershell from 7.3.5 to 7.3.6 #16167

    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Android] Fix Button IconSize #16164
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, control-image
  • [Android] Fix Keyboard.Numeric issue on DisplayPromptAsync #16163
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert, area/keyboard
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix issue loading images from Stream #16162
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-image

Merged

  • Various fixes for Border on Android #15458
    area/drawing ✏️
  • [Windows] Fix Slider MinimumTrackColor (#16056) #16057
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-slider

Updated

  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • [controls] fix memory leak with Grid Row/ColumnDefinitions #16145
    layout-grid, memory-leak 💦
  • Prevent Android timer from adding multiple callbacks #16078
  • Text needs to be set before other properties #16116
  • Prevent refresh command from executing when CanExecute is false #16090
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview
  • Bump the xunit group with 3 updates #16113
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • OOTB Templates Building for Linux #16143
    area/templates 📄
  • [WIN] Add Switch.ShowStatusLabel Platform-Specific #16147
    t/breaking 💥, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-switch
  • [Android] Fix SwipeView not swiping using Label as direct content #14824
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Reduce Confusion of DateSelected Event in DatePicker (Split Into DateSelected and DateChanged) #16153
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-datetimepicker
  • Bump the aspnetcore group with 7 updates #16114
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures
  • Windows (packaged) Device tests for CI #15629
